"Sword Boot Camp IV":
"Joseph, retired ARKS training officer, at your service.
Good to see you again. It seems that you've become
quite comfortable using swords through the training
missions thus far. Now I'd like you to show me that
you can reach even greater heights by completing
this mission. Let's see what you're truly made of.

*Complete the mission within 15 minutes
on Hard difficulty or above, using only a gigush."

"来たようだな。退役教導官のジョーゼフだ。
ここまでの講習を通じて、君は相当
ソードの扱いには慣れたと思う。
さらなる高みを目指すため
こちらの指定した条件をクリアして欲しい！
この任務が達成できたその時こそ
君の実力は世に知らしめられるのだ！

※『ギガッシュ』以外の大剣不可
ハード以上、15分以内クリア"
